title: 2-year-old boy critically injured in shooting accident
content:
LUBBOCK COUNTY, TX (KCBD) -
Authorities tell us that a 2-year-old boy was taken to ER Centers of America at 82nd and Slide with a gunshot wound to the abdomen around 5 p.m. on Thursday.
We're told shortly after, the child was transported to UMC.
Officials say he remains there in critical, but stable condition.
We're told the shooting happened at a home in Lubbock County and was accidental.
No charges have been filed at this time.
